body_content.explanation: intended to prevent radio signals from being jammed (= stopped from arriving):
examples: Industry analysts questioned the reliability of the system’s anti-jamming technology.
The radar system, with its sophisticated anti-jamming devices, was said to be both unnecessary and too expensive.

body_content.explanation: intended to prevent part of a machine from jamming (= becoming unable to move):
examples: The drill has an automatic greasing unit and an anti-jamming device.
The QWERTY layout was designed to prevent jamming on old-fashioned typewriters, but electronic keyboards have rendered this anti-jamming rationale defunct.
